fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
When visit roll 16 d'6s
When 4 or less are a 1 or 2, you breach.
After breaching select a player at day, they will be informed of being your target
At the end of the night they and all their visitors will die, regardless of defense or protection/healing.

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Have Scorched Girl end up killing 3 people
